title: Morning Jolt: Yogi Berra dies at 90
content:
Posted Sep. 23, 2015 @ 9:13 am  
  In the news Yogi Berra played on 14 American League championship teams and won 10 World Series titles, and he was really known for his “Yogisms” such as “it’s like deja vu all over again.” Opening bell The Dow Jones opened at 16,330.47. Quote of the day “You can observe a lot by watching.” - Yogi Berra Must-see video: 100-year-old breaks 5 world records A 100-year-old athlete set a whopping five world records in his age group at the Senior Olympics. More Content Now News
